title: Riot censoring the forums cause they don't want to fire the balance team
body:
These topics about balance keep coming up and if you say fire the balance team or GC the thread is removed or locked. Balance is really bad and the balance team refuses to listen to paying customers. They keep making terrible balance decisions, like ardent, like over tuned 3 shot adc, like lose bot lane lose the game, like snowbally games. 

What does the community think? Is if fair to request people be terminated if they are clearly doing a terrible job?
